snippet: Baltimore Ravens linebacker Terrell Suggs will have surgery for a partly torn Achilles’ tendon, but he said it would not keep him sidelined for the entire 2012 season.
abstract: Baltimore Ravens linebacker Terrell Suggs will have Achilles' tendon surgery, but says it will not keep him sidelined for the entire 2012 season.
lead_paragraph: Baltimore Ravens linebacker Terrell Suggs will have surgery for a partly torn Achilles’ tendon, but he said it would not keep him sidelined for the entire 2012 season.
